text: San Salvador is a department in El Salvador. The capital is San Salvador, which is also the national capital. It became a department on June 12, 1824. ==Municipalities== # Aguilares # Apopa # Ayutuxtepeque # Cuscatancingo # Delgado # El Paisnal # Guazapa # Ilopango # Mejicanos # Nejapa # Panchimalco # Rosario de Mora # San Marcos # San Martín # San Salvador # Santiago Texacuangos # Santo Tomás # Soyapango # Tonacatepeque Category:Departments of El Salvador Category:1824 establishments in El Salvador
title: San Salvador Department
